post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
I just finished playing the demo of this game and it's pretty fun so I thought I would share it...

http://www.worldofgoo.com/

There's an online mode too where you attempt to build the tallest tower using the extra goo balls you recover in each level.

post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
Bah!

For a brief moment I had the 237th tallest tower in the world. Then I got greedy and the damn thing collapsed.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
I've had that preordered since early feb. Awesome game.

you can get it direct from their site (and I think activate it in steam too), buy it from steam (NA only), direct2drive (and others), retail stores in NA & WiiWare in NA. Europe release is ~feb/march '09, will include an extra episode too.
